ExternalData.Subtitlesect: Agreement establishing the African Development Bank done at Khartoum on 4 August 1963, as amended by resolution 05-79 adopted by the Board of Governors on 17 May 1979

EIF.Label: Entry into force
EIF.Labeltext: 7 May 1982, in accordance with paragraph 4 of resolution 05-79.

TreatyText.Label: Text
TreatyText.Text: United Nations, Treaty Series , vol. 1276, p. 3; depositary notifications C.N.1099.2002.TREATIES-1 of 17 October 2002 (Entry into force of Amendment adopted by Resolution No. B/BG/92/06); C.N.1104.2002.TREATIES-1 of 18 October 2002 (Entry into force of Amendments adopted by Resolution No. B/BG/97/05); C.N.1105.2002.TREATIES-1 of 21 October 2002 (Entry into force of Amendments adopted by Resolution No. B/BG/98/04); C.N.1106.2002.TREATIES-1 of 21 October 2002 (Entry into force of Amendments adopted by Resolution No. B/BG/2001/08).

TreatyNote.Text: The original of the Agreement was established by the Secretary-General of the United Nations on 2 June 1982.
